titleNepali: SEE २०८१ अनिवार्य गणित अभ्यास परीक्षा १ (७५ पूर्णाङ्क)

context.Nepali: एउटा विद्यालयका १२०० जना विद्यार्थीहरूमा गरिएको सर्वेक्षणमा, १०० जनाले गणित मात्र र २०० जनाले विज्ञान मात्र मन पराउँछन् । ७०० जनाले यी दुईमध्ये कुनै पनि विषय मन पराउँदैनन् ।
context.English: In a survey among 1200 students, 100 like Mathematics only and 200 like Science only. 700 like neither of the subjects.

sub_questions.questionNepali: कुनै पनि विषय मन नपराउने विद्यार्थीको संख्या कति छ ?
sub_questions.questionEnglish: How many students like neither subject?
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
प्रश्नमा स्पष्ट रूपमा दिइएको छ कि ७०० विद्यार्थीहरूले गणित र विज्ञान दुवै मन पराउँदैनन् । यो समूह $(M \cup S)$ को पूरक हो ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
The problem explicitly states that 700 students like neither Mathematics nor Science. This represents the cardinality of the complement of the union of the two sets.
Citation: Lesson 1

sub_questions.questionNepali: दुवै विषय मन पराउने विद्यार्थीको संख्या पत्ता लगाउनुहोस् ।
sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find the number of students who like both subjects.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
जम्मा विद्यार्थी ($n(U)$) भनेको गणित मात्र, विज्ञान मात्र, दुवै मन पराउने र कुनै पनि मन नपराउनेहरूको योगफल हो । त्यसैले, $1200 = 100 + 200 + x + 700$ । हल गर्दा: $1200 = 1000 + x$, जसबाट $x = 200$ आउँछ ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
The Total ($n(U)$) is the sum of those who like Math only, Science only, Both, and Neither. So, $1200 = 100 + 200 + x + 700$. Simplifying gives $1200 = 1000 + x$, which means $x = 200$.
Citation: Lesson 1

sub_questions.questionNepali: कम्तीमा एउटा विषय मन पराउने विद्यार्थीको संख्या निकाल्नुहोस् ।
sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find the number of students who like at least one subject.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
कम्तीमा एउटा विषय मन पराउने भनेको $n(M \cup S)$ हो । यो निकाल्न जम्मा विद्यार्थी संख्याबाट कुनै पनि मन नपराउने संख्या घटाउनुपर्छ: $1200 - 700 = 500$ ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Students who like 'at least one' subject represents the union of the sets ($n(M \cup S)$). This is calculated by subtracting those who like 'neither' from the total: $1200 - 700 = 500$.
Citation: Lesson 1

sub_questions.questionNepali: विज्ञान मन पराउने र गणित मन पराउने विद्यार्थीको अनुपात निकाल्नुहोस् ।
sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find the ratio of students who like Science to those who like Mathematics.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
विज्ञान मन पराउने जम्मा = विज्ञान मात्र (२००) + दुवै (२००) = ४०० । गणित मन पराउने जम्मा = गणित मात्र (१००) + दुवै (२००) = ३०० । अनुपात $400 : 300$, जसलाई सरल गर्दा $4 : 3$ हुन्छ ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Total Science = Science Only (200) + Both (200) = 400. Total Math = Math Only (100) + Both (200) = 300. The ratio is $400 : 300$, which simplifies to $4 : 3$.
Citation: Lesson 1

context.Nepali: एक जना शिक्षकले रु. ५०,००० बैङ्कमा जम्मा गर्नुभयो । यदि बैङ्कले वार्षिक १०% ब्याज दिन्छ भने:
context.English: A teacher deposited Rs. 50,000 in a bank. The bank provides 10% annual interest.

sub_questions.questionNepali: ३ वर्षमा हुने चक्रीय ब्याज र मिश्रधन पत्ता लगाउनुहोस् ।
sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find the compound interest and compound amount in 3 years.
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Using the formula $CA = P(1 + R/100)^T$: $50000(1 + 0.1)^3 = 50000(1.331) = 66,550$. Compound Interest is $CA - P$, so $66,550 - 50,000 = 16,550$.
Citation: Lesson 2

sub_questions.questionNepali: सोही रकम र समयका लागि साधारण ब्याज गणना गर्नुहोस् ।
sub_questions.questionEnglish: Calculate the simple interest for the same sum and time.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
साधारण ब्याजको सूत्र $SI = (P \times T \times R) / 100$ हो । मान राख्दा: $(50000 \times 3 \times 10) / 100 = 15,000$ ।
उद्धरण: पाठ २
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Using the simple interest formula $SI = (P \times T \times R) / 100$: $(50000 \times 3 \times 10) / 100 = 15,000$.
Citation: Lesson 2

context.Nepali: एउटा गाउँपालिकाको २ वर्ष अघिको जनसङ्ख्या २८,५०० थियो । यदि वृद्धिदर २% छ भने:
context.English: The population of a municipality 2 years ago was 28,500. Growth rate is 2%.

sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Using the population growth formula $P_T = P(1 + R/100)^T$ with $P=28500, T=2, R=2$: $28500(1.02)^2 = 28500 \times 1.0404 \approx 29,651$.
Citation: Lesson 3

sub_questions.questionEnglish: By how much did the population increase?
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
बढेको जनसङ्ख्या = हालको जनसङ्ख्या - सुरुको जनसङ्ख्या । $29,651 - 28,500 = 1,151$ ।
उद्धरण: पाठ ३
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Population increase = Present Population - Initial Population. $29,651 - 28,500 = 1,151$.
Citation: Lesson 3

context.Nepali: अमेरिकी डलर १ को खरिद दर ने.रु. १३१.५० र बिक्री दर ने.रु. १३२.५० छ ।
context.English: Buying rate of 1 US Dollar is NRs. 131.50 and selling rate is NRs. 132.50.

sub_questions.questionEnglish: How much NRs will you get for $500?
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
तपाईंले डलर बैंकलाई दिँदा, बैंकले 'खरिद दर' (Buying Rate) प्रयोग गर्छ । त्यसैले $500 \times 131.50 = 65,750$ हुन्छ ।
उद्धरण: पाठ ४
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
When you give dollars to the bank, the bank uses the 'Buying Rate'. Therefore, calculation is $500 \times 131.50 = 65,750$.
Citation: Lesson 4

sub_questions.questionNepali: ने.रु. १,००,००० ले कति डलर साट्न सकिन्छ ?
sub_questions.questionEnglish: How many dollars can be exchanged with NRs. 1,00,000?
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
तपाईंले डलर किन्दा, बैंकले 'बिक्री दर' (Selling Rate) लगाउँछ । रकम = $1,00,000 / 132.50 \approx 754.72$ डलर ।
उद्धरण: पाठ ४
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
When you want to buy dollars from the bank, they apply the 'Selling Rate'. Calculation: $1,00,000 / 132.50 \approx 754.72$.
Citation: Lesson 4

context.Nepali: एउटा वर्ग आधार भएको पिरामिडको आधारको क्षेत्रफल ६४ वर्ग से.मि. र उचाइ १५ से.मि. छ ।
context.English: A square-based pyramid has base area 64 sq. cm and height 15 cm.

sub_questions.questionEnglish: What is the length of the side of the base?
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
वर्गाकार आधारको क्षेत्रफल $A = a^2$ हुन्छ । यहाँ $a^2 = 64$ भएकोले, $a = \sqrt{64} = 8$ से.मि. हुन्छ ।
उद्धरण: पाठ ५
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
The area of a square base is $A = a^2$. Given $a^2 = 64$, the side length is $a = \sqrt{64} = 8$ cm.
Citation: Lesson 5

sub_questions.explanationNepali:
पिरामिडको आयतनको सूत्र $V = \frac{1}{3} \times A \times h$ हो । मान राख्दा: $\frac{1}{3} \times 64 \times 15 = 64 \times 5 = 320$ घन से.मि. ।
उद्धरण: पाठ ५
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
The formula for the volume of a pyramid is $V = \frac{1}{3} \times A \times h$. Substituting values: $\frac{1}{3} \times 64 \times 15 = 64 \times 5 = 320$ cm³.
Citation: Lesson 5

context.Nepali: एउटा आइसक्रिम (सोली र अर्धगोला) को अर्धव्यास २१ से.मि. र जम्मा आयतन ३२,३४० घन से.मि. छ ।
context.English: An ice cream (cone + hemisphere) has radius 21 cm and total volume 32,340 cm³.

sub_questions.explanationNepali:
कुल आयतन = सोलीको आयतन ($\frac{1}{3}\pi r^2 h$) + अर्धगोलाको आयतन ($\frac{2}{3}\pi r^3$) ।
उद्धरण: पाठ ५
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Total Volume = Volume of Cone ($\frac{1}{3}\pi r^2 h$) + Volume of Hemisphere ($\frac{2}{3}\pi r^3$).
Citation: Lesson 5

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Calculate the height of the cone.
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Substitute values: $32340 = \frac{1}{3} \pi (21)^2 (h + 2r)$. Simplifying: $32340 = 462(h + 42)$. Dividing by 462 gives $70 = h + 42$, so $h = 28$.
Citation: Lesson 5

context.Nepali: एउटा कोठाको लम्बाइ १२ मिटर, चौडाइ ८ मिटर र उचाइ ३ मिटर छ ।

sub_questions.explanationNepali:
भुइँको क्षेत्रफल = लम्बाइ $\times$ चौडाइ = $12 \times 8 = 96$ वर्ग मिटर ।
उद्धरण: पाठ ५
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Floor Area = Length $\times$ Breadth = $12 \times 8 = 96$ sq. m.
Citation: Lesson 5

sub_questions.questionNepali: चार भित्तामा रङ लगाउँदा प्रति वर्ग मिटर रु. १५ ले कति खर्च लाग्छ ?
sub_questions.questionEnglish: Cost of painting 4 walls at Rs. 15/sq.m?
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
चार भित्ताको क्षेत्रफल $= 2h(l+b) = 2(3)(12+8) = 6(20) = 120$ वर्ग मि. । खर्च = क्षेत्रफल $\times$ दर = $120 \times 15 = 1,800$ ।
उद्धरण: पाठ ५
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Area of 4 walls $= 2h(l+b) = 2(3)(12+8) = 120$ sq. m. Cost = Area $\times$ Rate = $120 \times 15 = 1,800$.
Citation: Lesson 5

sub_questions.explanationNepali:
प्राकृतिक संख्याहरूको योगफलको सूत्र $S_n = \frac{n(n+1)}{2}$ हो । (वा समानन्तर श्रेणीको सूत्र $S_n = \frac{n}{2}[2a+(n-1)d]$)।
उद्धरण: पाठ ६
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
The sum of the first n natural numbers is given by $S_n = \frac{n(n+1)}{2}$. Alternatively, use the AP sum formula.
Citation: Lesson 6

Using the formula: $S_{20} = \frac{20(21)}{2} = 10 \times 21 = 210$.
Citation: Lesson 6

sub_questions.questionNepali: योगफल ४६५ भए पद संख्या कति हुन्छ ?
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
$465 = \frac{n(n+1)}{2} \Rightarrow 930 = n^2 + n \Rightarrow n^2 + n - 930 = 0$ । खण्डीकरण गर्दा $(n+31)(n-30)=0$, त्यसैले $n=30$ ।
उद्धरण: पाठ ६
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
$465 = \frac{n(n+1)}{2} \Rightarrow 930 = n^2 + n$. Solving the quadratic $n^2 + n - 930 = 0$, we find factors (31, -30). So $n=30$.
Citation: Lesson 6

sub_questions.explanationNepali:
यो समीकरणको डिग्री २ छ, त्यसैले यो वर्ग समीकरण हो ।
उद्धरण: पाठ ७
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Since the degree of the variable is 2, it is a Quadratic Equation.
Citation: Lesson 7

sub_questions.explanationNepali:
खण्डीकरण गर्दा: $x^2 - 5x + 2x - 10 = 0 \Rightarrow x(x-5) + 2(x-5) = 0 \Rightarrow (x-5)(x+2) = 0$ । त्यसैले $x = 5$ वा $x = -2$ ।
उद्धरण: पाठ ७
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Factorizing: Split middle term $-3x$ into $-5x + 2x$. Grouping gives $(x-5)(x+2)=0$. Thus $x=5$ or $x=-2$.
Citation: Lesson 7

Substituting $x=5$: $25 - 15 - 10 = 0$. Substituting $x=-2$: $4 - 3(-2) - 10 = 4 + 6 - 10 = 0$. Both satisfy the equation.
Citation: Lesson 7

sub_questions.explanationNepali:
$2^x \times 3^x \times 3^1 = 18 \Rightarrow (2 \times 3)^x \times 3 = 18 \Rightarrow 6^x = 18/3 = 6$ ।
उद्धरण: पाठ ९
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Break $3^{x+1}$ into $3^x \times 3$. Combine $2^x \times 3^x$ to get $6^x$. Divide 18 by 3 to get 6. Final: $6^x = 6$.
Citation: Lesson 9

sub_questions.explanationNepali:
$6^x = 6^1$ भएकोले, आधार एउटै हुँदा घाताङ्क बराबर हुन्छ, त्यसैले $x = 1$ ।
उद्धरण: पाठ ९
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Since $6^x = 6^1$, equating the exponents gives $x = 1$.
Citation: Lesson 9

context.Nepali: समानान्तर चतुर्भुजको क्षेत्रफल ४८ वर्ग से.मि. छ । एउटै आधारमा बनेको त्रिभुज QTR छ ।
context.English: Parallelogram Area = 48 sq. cm. Triangle QTR is on the same base.

sub_questions.explanationNepali:
एउटै आधार र उही समानान्तर रेखाहरू बिच बनेको त्रिभुजको क्षेत्रफल समानान्तर चतुर्भुजको क्षेत्रफलको आधा हुन्छ ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १०
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
The area of a triangle on the same base and between the same parallel lines is half the area of the parallelogram.
Citation: Lesson 10

sub_questions.explanationNepali:
त्रिभुजको क्षेत्रफल = $\frac{1}{2} \times 48 = 24$ वर्ग से.मि. ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १०
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Triangle Area = $\frac{1}{2} \times$ Parallelogram Area = $\frac{1}{2} \times 48 = 24$ sq. cm.
Citation: Lesson 10

context.English: In a circle, central angle $\angle AOB = 100^\circ$.

sub_questions.questionNepali: केन्द्रिय कोण र परिधिको कोणको सम्बन्ध लेख्नुहोस् ।
sub_questions.questionEnglish: Relation between central and inscribed angle.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
एउटै चापमा बनेको परिधिको कोण केन्द्रिय कोणको आधा हुन्छ ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १२
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
The inscribed angle subtended by an arc is half the angle subtended by it at the center.
Citation: Lesson 12

sub_questions.explanationNepali:
$\angle ACB = \frac{1}{2} \times \angle AOB = \frac{1}{2} \times 100 = 50^\circ$ ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १२
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
$\angle ACB = \frac{1}{2} \times 100 = 50^\circ$.
Citation: Lesson 12

sub_questions.explanationNepali:
दुवै कोणहरू एउटै चाप AB मा आधारित छन् ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १२
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Both angles are subtended by the same arc AB.
Citation: Lesson 12

sub_questions.explanationNepali:
यहाँ $6^2 + 8^2 = 36 + 64 = 100 = 10^2$ हुन्छ । पाइथागोरस साध्य मिलेकोले यो समकोण त्रिभुज हो ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १०
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Since $6^2 + 8^2 = 100 = 10^2$, the sides satisfy the Pythagoras theorem. Thus, it is a right-angled triangle.
Citation: Lesson 10

sub_questions.explanationNepali:
समकोण त्रिभुजको क्षेत्रफल = $\frac{1}{2} \times \text{base} \times \text{height} = \frac{1}{2} \times 6 \times 8 = 24$ ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १०
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Area = $\frac{1}{2} \times 6 \times 8 = 24$ sq. cm.
Citation: Lesson 10

context.Nepali: एउटा टावरको उचाइ ५० मिटर छ । टुप्पोबाट हेर्दा ६० डिग्री अवनति कोण बन्छ ।
context.English: Height of tower is 50m. Angle of depression from top is 60 degrees.

sub_questions.explanationNepali:
क्षितिज रेखाभन्दा तल रहेको वस्तुलाई हेर्दा बन्ने कोणलाई अवनति कोण भनिन्छ ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १५
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
The angle formed by the line of sight with the horizontal when an observer looks downwards at an object.
Citation: Lesson 15

sub_questions.explanationNepali:
अवनति कोण र उन्नतांश कोण बराबर हुन्छन् । $\tan 60^\circ = \frac{\text{Height}}{\text{Distance}} \Rightarrow \sqrt{3} = \frac{50}{d} \Rightarrow d = \frac{50}{1.732} \approx 28.87$ मि. ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १५
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Angle of depression equals angle of elevation ($60^\circ$). Using $\tan 60^\circ = p/b \Rightarrow \sqrt{3} = 50/d$. So, $d = 50/\sqrt{3} \approx 28.87$ m.
Citation: Lesson 15

sub_questions.explanationNepali:
व्यक्तिगत श्रेणीको लागि मध्यिकाको स्थान $(N+1)/2$ औं पद हुन्छ ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १३
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
For individual series, the median position is given by the $(N+1)/2$-th item.
Citation: Lesson 13

sub_questions.explanationNepali:
$Q_3 = 3(11+1)/4 = 9$th पद । क्रमबद्ध सूचीमा नवौं पद २२ हो ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १३
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
$Q_3$ position is $3(N+1)/4 = 3(12)/4 = 9$th item. From the sorted list, the 9th item is 22.
Citation: Lesson 13

sub_questions.explanationNepali:
३ सिक्का उचाल्दा जम्मा $2^3=8$ परिणाम हुन्छन्: {HHH, HHT, HTH, HTT, THH, THT, TTH, TTT} ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १४
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Tossing 3 coins gives $2^3=8$ outcomes: {HHH, HHT, HTH, HTT, THH, THT, TTH, TTT}.
Citation: Lesson 14

sub_questions.questionNepali: कम्तीमा २ टाउको आउने सम्भाव्यता कति हुन्छ ?
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
कम्तीमा २ टाउको आउने घटनाहरू: {HHH, HHT, HTH, THH} (४ वटा) । सम्भाव्यता = $4/8 = 1/2$ ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १४
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Outcomes with at least 2 heads: {HHH, HHT, HTH, THH}. There are 4 favorable outcomes out of 8. Probability = $4/8 = 1/2$.
Citation: Lesson 14
